properties.text:
=== Rules ===
The objective of the game is to defeat the enemy team by hitting its members until they no longer have life points.
If a character gets hit by the ball without catching it, that character loses a life point.
If a character stops a ball thrown by an enemy without rebounds, the character who stopped the ball can throw it with more power.
To activate a Power-Up, the player has just to hit it by himself. The Power-Up assigned will be the one corresponding to the last colour of the Power-Up before the impact.
Once stopped the ball, the player has three seconds to release it. If at the end of the three seconds the player still has the ball, it will be released with a very low speed.
Once activated, the Power-Up lasts for ten seconds.
The player could deviate the ball hitting it with another ball.

=== Controls ===
The player can lead his character by the left analog stick of his gamepad.
Pressing the "RT" button at the right moment, the player can catch the ball.
Pressing the "RT" button the player can throw the ball he has just caught.
The player can lead the ball by the right analog stick of his gamepad.

=== Power-Ups ===
Health (Green): restores one life point except when the player has all his life points.

Faster speed (Light blue): increases the player's speed.

Shield (White): while the Power-Up is on, the player is invulnerable.

Spiderman (Turquoise): the player can automatically stop the ball. While the Power-Up is on, there is no time limit to release it.
